entries.m_rejected: You rejected me you bad person. I dont want to talk to you. Leave me alone!
entries.m_sorry: I am so sorry I cannot provide anything... please just help me!
entries.m_betrayed: You would allow them to attack me? You will die before I do!!
entries.m_saved: I am saved! I am saved!
entries.a_no_progress: Go away... I have no time for you...
entries.a_tired_waiting: I am tired of waiting... enough of this... attack!
entries.a_brushoff: i am brushing you off since you didnt have any credit for this poi
entries.a_thank_negotiate_again: Thanks again for working this out for us...
entries.a_negotiate_fail: What?! You just wasted my time!
entries.a_waiting: I am waiting for you to do something... and if you dont do it soon... i am gonna attack!
entries.a_greet_mad: What? you agreed to help mediator? you will die too!
entries.minion_5: i am a minion... this is random flavor text 5
entries.minion_4: i am a minion... this is random flavor text 4
entries.minion_3: i am a minion... this is random flavor text 3
entries.minion_2: i am a minion... this is random flavor text 2
entries.minion_1: i am a minion... this is random flavor text 1
entries.a_thank_negotiate: I am thanking you for negotiating this...
entries.a_thank_combat: I am thanking you for killing the mediator
entries.a_respond_m_1: I am responding to mediator greet!
entries.m_greet_a: I, the mediator, am responding to the antagonist leaders threat
entries.a_greet_m: I the antagonist leader am accosting the mediator verbally
entries.m_waiting: You agreed to help me and we are waiting... they should be here soon, please wait!
entries.m_thank_negotiate: Thank you for negotiating me out of that mess...
entries.a_accept_offer: this will do just fine... for now...
entries.m_no_negotiate: but i have nothing to give... help me!!
entries.m_will_negotiate: I think I have something that would fix the situation...
entries.a_no_negotiate: there will be no negotiating... get out of our way or suffer the same fate...
entries.a_maybe: ok... you can try to negotiate... but be quick about it...
entries.m_maybe: You talk to the baddies when they get here then... maybe you can work something out.
entries.a_greet_imperial: our factions are both imperial... i will greet you much nicer
entries.a_greet_rebel: our factions are both rebel... i will greet you much nicer
entries.m_thank_combat: Thank you for hurting those baddies!
entries.m_no: no? please please please help me!!
entries.m_yes: You answered yes... here is what you are supposed to do
entries.a_greet: I am the antagonist greeting you... mediator is not innocent for this reason. will you allow us to do our job?
entries.m_greet: I am the mediator greeting you... the antagonists are going to do something bad. will you help me?
